subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Athletics Manager Ken Macha hopped out of the loaner Hummer that brings him far more attention than he would prefer, and made his way into McAfee Coliseum for a recent team workout.
snippet: Athletics Manager Ken Macha hopped out of the loaner Hummer that brings him far more attention than he would prefer, and made his way into McAfee Coliseum for a recent team workout.
